title: Punk Goes ... ( 7 Albums ) The Punk Goes Series [ Metal, Pop, Ac
description:
This is almost the complete Punk Goes.. series cept for Punk Goes Acoustic there are 8 extra tracks on a bonus cd which isn&#039;t included. Sorry. If someone has them hook a mofo up! - Dewey420

14. "Looks That Kill" (MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶tley CrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¼e) - Diesel Boy

Leather Pyrate is a fictional band. On their website, the Aquabats admit they wrote the song.

Notes

The version of Swing Life Away by Rise Against on this compliation is not the album/single version that gained popularity in 2005/2006. It is an earlier version of the song which ends after the second chorus. It also features a different intro.
